‚ÄúWe are student-centered by design. Student projects are governed by a framework, but students can pitch modifications to projects, tailoring them to their own interests. We are competency-based and give kids permission to use their time how they need to in order to complete projects. Students can move at their own pace through courses. This removes barriers related to time, place, and pace.‚Äù

FlexTech High School ‚Äì Novi will be working to examine and revise the school's own curriculum, instruction, assessment, and cultural practices to ensure we are creating a culturally responsive curriculum and environment where every student feels welcome and safe. The student population at FlexTech ‚Äì Novi is racially diverse, but our staff is not. We will continue to seek out learning opportunities for the coming school year to build our capacity as inclusive and responsive educators. We have a unique opportunity at FlexTech High School ‚Äì Novi because our students come from diverse backgrounds, experiences, and communities. Our goal is to create a school culture that will allow our students to become well-rounded, conscious, anti-racist people who challenge systemic oppression. #blacklivesmatter
